edu.ncsu.csc216.travel.model.office

Class TourCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • edu.ncsu.csc216.travel.model.office.TourCoordinator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TravelManager

    public class TourCoordinator
extends java.util.Observable
implements TravelManager
    Implements TravelManager and represents the person coordinating tours, clients, and reservations. The TourCoordinator maintains a sorted list of tours and a list of clients.
    Author:
    sarahworley

      • addNewTour

        public Tour addNewTour(java.lang.String kind,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       java.time.LocalDate startDate,
                       int duration,
                       int basePrice,
                       int capacity)
                throws DuplicateTourException
        Creates a tour according to the given parameters.
        Specified by:
        addNewTour in interface TravelManager
        Parameters:
        kind - kind of tour (River Cruise, Land Tour, Educational Trip)
        name - tour name
        startDate - tour start date
        duration - length of tour in days
        basePrice - minimum per-person price
        capacity - maximum number of tour participants
        Returns:
        the newly created tour
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any parameters are not valid
        DuplicateTourException - if a duplicate tour has already been added

      • addNewReservation

        public Reservation addNewReservation(int clientIndex,
                                     int filteredTourIndex,
                                     int numInParty)
                              throws CapacityException
        Adds a new reservation for a client on a tour with the given number of participants.
        Specified by:
        addNewReservation in interface TravelManager
        Parameters:
        clientIndex - location of the client in the list of clients
        filteredTourIndex - location of the tour in the list of tours restricted to the current filters
        numInParty - number of participants for this reservation
        Returns:
        the newly added reservation
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either index is invalid
        CapacityException - if the tour does not have the capacity to accommodate the reservation

      • addOldReservation

        public Reservation addOldReservation(Client c,
                                     Tour t,
                                     int numInParty,
                                     int confCode)
                              throws CapacityException
        Adds an existing reservation for a given client and tour
        Specified by:
        addOldReservation in interface TravelManager
        Parameters:
        c - Client for the reservation
        t - Tour for the reservation
        numInParty - Size of the party for the reservation
        confCode - Confirmation code for the reservation
        Returns:
        the reservation
        Throws:
        CapacityException - if the reservation could not be established because of lack of capacity
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any reservation data are not valid (client/trip don't exist etc)
